channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 在长岛的大南湾，有一块 3.37 英亩的地块突入水中，可俯瞰火岛（Fire Island），该地块即将上市，售价可能达到破纪录的 1,650 万美元。
item.description:
On Long Island's Great South Bay, a 3.37-acre parcel that juts out into the water and overlooks Fire Island is coming on the market for a potentially record-breaking $16.5 million https://t.co/9T5Ckv5FMg https://t.co/9T5Ckv5FMg

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 29, 2024

item.title: 阿拉巴马州最高法院裁定胚胎符合儿童条件后，阿拉巴马州议会两院均通过了旨在保护试管婴儿服务提供者的法案
item.description:
Both chambers of the Alabama Legislature have passed bills intended to protect IVF providers after the state Supreme Court ruled that embryos qualify as children https://t.co/qK7UNCRCx3 https://t.co/qK7UNCRCx3

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 29, 2024

item.title: 得克萨斯州潘汉德尔地区的一场野火是该州历史上规模最大的野火，烧毁了 100 多万亩土地，摧毁了房屋，造成数千头牛死亡
item.description:
A wildfire in the Texas Panhandle is the largest in state history, scorching more than 1 million acres, destroying homes and killing thousands of cattle https://t.co/9QH1yLM0m7 https://t.co/9QH1yLM0m7

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 29, 2024

item.title: 亚历山大-斯米尔诺夫（Alexander Smirnov）被指控兜售针对拜登总统及其儿子亨特的虚假贿赂指控，他经常利用自己与联邦调查局的关系来赚钱
item.description:
Alexander Smirnov, accused of peddling false bribery allegations against President Biden and his son Hunter, often dangled his FBI connections in an effort to make money https://t.co/Y2j1M1DVCi https://t.co/Y2j1M1DVCi

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 29, 2024

item.title: 美国总统拜登和前总统唐纳德-特朗普访问了美墨边境，双方都试图将选民最关心的创纪录的非法越境事件归咎于对方。
item.description:
President Biden and former President Donald Trump visited the U.S.-Mexico border, each seeking to blame the other’s party for record illegal crossings that are a top concern for voters https://t.co/qgjUROLQqQ https://t.co/qgjUROLQqQ

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 29, 2024

item.title: 投资公司 Magnetar 将分拆其价值 15 亿美元的能源和基础设施私募股权和信贷业务，成立一家名为 Elda River Capital Management 的新公司。
item.description:
Investment firm Magnetar is spinning out its $1.5 billion energy and infrastructure private equity and credit business into a new firm called Elda River Capital Management https://t.co/SdU6jkGcnY https://t.co/SdU6jkGcnY

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 29, 2024

item.title: 一位经纪人的合作公寓房源有一个很大的缺点：噩梦般的邻居。"我发现门上贴着一张笔记本纸，上面潦草地写着：'别买这个！老鼠和虫子！'"
item.description:
A broker's listing for a co-op came with a big downside: a nightmare neighbor. "I found a piece of notebook paper taped to the door that said in scrawled handwriting: 'Don’t buy this! Rats and Bugs!'” https://t.co/mY8N64tAZ7 https://t.co/mY8N64tAZ7

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 29, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：米奇-麦康奈尔（Mitch McConnell）在参议院留下的最大讽刺是，左翼憎恨他是因为他很有效率，而他自己的政党却没有意识到这一点
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: The great irony of Mitch McConnell’s Senate legacy is that the left hates him because he’s effective, which his own party failed to appreciate https://t.co/JUKBue1R5h https://t.co/JUKBue1R5h

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 29, 2024

item.title: 以色列军方和加沙卫生官员说，在加沙地带发生涉及援助卡车车队的一系列混乱事件时，以色列军队向巴勒斯坦平民开火，促使哈马斯暂停微妙的停火谈判。
item.description:
Israeli troops opened fire on Palestinian civilians as a chaotic series of events unfolded involving a convoy of aid trucks in the Gaza Strip, the Israeli military and Gaza health officials said, prompting Hamas to pause delicate cease-fire negotiations https://t.co/3yFtsncEiZ

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 29, 2024

item.title: 中间派政治团体 "无标签"（No Labels）数月来一直在权衡可能的 "团结 "总统候选人名单，该团体表示将于下周决定是否继续推进这一努力
item.description:
No Labels, the centrist political group that has spent months weighing a possible “unity” presidential ticket, says it will make a decision next week on whether to push ahead with the effort https://t.co/CpZFKyyk1h https://t.co/CpZFKyyk1h

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 29, 2024

item.title: 法式经典蛋菜 "oeufs en cocotte "不仅吃起来美味，说起来也很有趣，是一道简单、优雅的随时佳肴
item.description:
As delicious to eat as it is fun to say, the classic French egg dish of "oeufs en cocotte" makes an easy, elegant anytime meal https://t.co/A3cvz6pO8H https://t.co/A3cvz6pO8H

item.title: 达芙妮-凯勒（Daphne Keller）和弗朗西斯-福山（Francis Fukuyama）写道："最高法院应废除各州监管网络言论的法律，让用户在新技术的推动下做出选择。
item.description:
The Supreme Court should strike down state laws regulating online speech and let users make those choices, empowered by new technologies, write Daphne Keller and Francis Fukuyama https://t.co/ffeTaRKo5F https://t.co/ffeTaRKo5F

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 29, 2024

item.title: 随着降雪量越来越难以预测，阿尔卑斯山的欧洲度假胜地正依靠其他景点来吸引高端滑雪者再次光临并大肆消费。
item.description:
With snowfall becoming less predictable, European resorts in the Alps are depending on other attractions to keep high-end skiers coming back and spending big https://t.co/PnOdQ15Nia https://t.co/PnOdQ15Nia

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 29, 2024

item.title: 不报税的高收入者即将收到美国国税局的通知：该机构表示，已开始向 2017 年至 2021 年期间收入在 40 万美元或以上且未报税的个人发出超过 12.5 万份通知。
item.description:
High earners who don’t file their taxes are about to hear from the IRS: The agency said it started sending out more than 125,000 notices to individuals who made $400,000 or more and failed to file returns between 2017 and 2021. https://t.co/N2V1WknQpI https://t.co/N2V1WknQpI

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 29, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：美国证券交易委员会的影子内幕交易理论似乎是监管机构利用模糊法律扩大权力、破坏法律正当程序的又一例证

item.title: 观看：随着《奥本海默》等大片的成功上映，IMAX 在电影业中扮演着越来越重要的角色。华尔街日报》探讨了创造身临其境的电影体验所需的技术。
item.description:
Watch: With the success of major releases like “Oppenheimer,” IMAX is playing an increasing role in the movie industry. WSJ explores the tech that goes into creating an immersive movie experience. https://t.co/V8TXMBFrw3 https://t.co/V8TXMBFrw3

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 29, 2024

item.title: 在努力驱逐俄罗斯军队的同时，一场更为平静的国家生存之战也在激烈进行：乌克兰为在工厂、城市和农场取得胜利而战
item.description:
